import React, { Component } from 'react' import coursesReducer from '../../store/reducers/courses'; class CourseItem extends Component { render() { var {course} = this.props; return (
{/* Course Content */}

{course.TenKhoaHoc}

{course.NguoiTao} Art & Design

{course.MoTa}

{/* Seat Rating Fee */}
{course.LuotXem}
4.5
$45
) } } export default CourseItem
